definition: powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: Xenon lamp IR energy is ideal for flash fusing toner.
sentences.chinese: 氙灯红外能量是理想的闪光融合碳粉。

sentences.english: Amorphism can occur when carbon powders are refined further.
sentences.chinese: 当作用时间较长时，碳粉会发生无定形化。

sentences.english: For example, the Lancome Blanc Expert Mela Lotion toner goes for $35 on StrawberryNet.
sentences.chinese: 例如，兰蔻美白霜白专家碳粉不用为35美元的草莓。

sentences.english: We are the biggest manufacturer of conventional toner.
sentences.chinese: 我们是传统碳粉的最大制造商。

sentences.english: The toners are prepared with special infrared, energy-absorption constituents.
sentences.chinese: 该碳粉准备，特别红外线，能量吸收成分。

sentences.english: The cyan, yellow and magenta toners each have their own fuser behavior assignments.
sentences.chinese: 在青色，黄色和洋红色碳粉都有自己的定影行为转让。

sentences.english: Sometimes I just use it as a calming toner.
sentences.chinese: 有时我只是用它作为一个平静碳粉。

sentences.english: We are looking to buy used cartridge and toner and cartridge scrap.
sentences.chinese: 我们期待购买使用的墨盒和碳粉和墨盒废弃。

sentences.english: PROCESS OF PRODUCTION Boron Carbide is smelted from boric acid and powdered carbon in electric furnace under high temperature.
sentences.chinese: 碳化硼生产过程是由硼酸和冶炼电炉碳粉在高温下。

sentences.english: You can wingk to the stockroom to see if there's any toner cfine artridge left.
sentences.chinese: 你可以到蕴藏室看看碳粉匣有没有剩。

sentences.english: There are also substantial environmental benefits to manufacturing Polymerised toner compared to traditional methods.
sentences.chinese: 也有聚合碳粉制造传统方法相比，巨大的环境效益。

sentences.english: Use toner with ferricyanide when sepia toning photographs.
sentences.chinese: 使用碳粉铁氰化钾的照片时，棕褐色色调。

sentences.english: You can walk to the stockroom to see if there's any toner cartridge left.
sentences.chinese: 你可以到蕴藏室看看碳粉匣有无剩。

sentences.english: The effect of mechanical impact on physical and chemical properties of carbon powders was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了机械力对碳粉物理化学性能的影响规律。
